page.title: 11Local Government-South Kyme
page.content: North Kesteven District Council at Sleaford is responsible for many services at South Kyme. It sets and collects the rents and rates of the council houses. Improvement Grants are used on private and council property, planning regulations are enforced to keep the true character of the village. The Parish Council are consulted, and make suggestions. Lincolnshire County Council run a fortnightly Mobile Library service, which is well patronised by adults and children. Refuse is collected weekly. North Kesteven District Council is responsible for the maintenance of roads and footpaths. Snow clearance is done with the help of local farm- ers. There is no Police, Fire or Ambulance Station in the Parish, but these are readily available.
